attributes.action: Lobby for the instigation of a NATO controlled ‘no fly zone’ over Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: Because it is the very least that the UK should to be doing.
attributes.background: Use all means possible to establish the necessary international resolve to act on this issue and protect the innocent people of a European nation.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
